server.definition: SELECT * FROM ENT_VRSN_TBL INNER JOIN ENT_TBL USING (ENT_ID) WHERE OBSLT_UTC IS NULL AND -- NOT NULL ENT_TBL.CLS_CD_ID IN ('9de2a846-ddf2-4ebc-902e-84508c5089ea', 'BACD9C6F-3FA9-481E-9636-37457962804D') -- IS PERSON NOT PATIENT AND ENT_ID IN ( SELECT TRG_ENT_ID -- RELATED FROM ENT_REL_TBL WHERE OBSLT_VRSN_SEQ_ID IS NULL AND -- ACTIVE RELATIONSHIP SRC_ENT_ID IN ( -- SOURCE IS ASSIGNED IDENTIFIER WE'RE INTERESTED IN OR IS ASSIGNED TO OUR FAC SELECT ENT_ID FROM ENT_ID_TBL WHERE AUT_ID IN ($authority$) AND OBSLT_VRSN_SEQ_ID IS NULL UNION SELECT SRC_ENT_ID FROM ENT_REL_TBL WHERE REL_TYP_CD_ID = 'ff34dfa7-c6d3-4f8b-bc9f-14bcdc13ba6c' AND TRG_ENT_ID IN ($facility$) ) )

SELECT * FROM ENT_VRSN_TBL INNER JOIN ENT_TBL USING (ENT_ID) WHERE OBSLT_UTC IS NULL AND -- NOT NULL ENT_TBL.CLS_CD_ID IN ('9de2a846-ddf2-4ebc-902e-84508c5089ea', 'BACD9C6F-3FA9-481E-9636-37457962804D') -- IS PERSON NOT PATIENT AND ENT_ID IN ( SELECT TRG_ENT_ID -- RELATED FROM ENT_REL_TBL WHERE OBSLT_VRSN_SEQ_ID IS NULL AND -- ACTIVE RELATIONSHIP SRC_ENT_ID IN ( -- SOURCE IS ASSIGNED IDENTIFIER WE'RE INTERESTED IN OR IS ASSIGNED TO OUR FAC SELECT ENT_ID FROM ENT_ID_TBL WHERE AUT_ID IN ($authority$) AND OBSLT_VRSN_SEQ_ID IS NULL UNION SELECT SRC_ENT_ID FROM ENT_REL_TBL WHERE REL_TYP_CD_ID = char_to_uuid('ff34dfa7-c6d3-4f8b-bc9f-14bcdc13ba6c') AND TRG_ENT_ID IN ($facility$) ) )
